_source.short_desc: Easy inventory control, order tracking, invoicing and reporting web app for across multiple locations - including manufacturing.
_source.long_desc: Online inventory control for medium-sized businesses. Businesses around the world use Megaventory to streamline processes with serials, batches, returns, dropshipping, internal transfers and more. Boost efficiency with stock alerts, supplier availability & lead times. Multiple locations and languages supported. User-friendly interface, comprehensive customer support and value for investment! Native Magento, WooCommerce, Shopify, Quickbooks extensions available. Sign up for a free trial!
_source.pricing_details:
Pro: $150/month for 5 users, 50k transactions.
Enterprise: Contact Megaventory for detailed pricing information.
_source.target_audience: CEO/COO/IT manager of a business of 10+ people that buy, sell, distribute or manufacture physical goods primarily.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS offers full inventory control with no-code features such as shipment tracking, automations, integrations, and more.
related_products.features: monday.com Work OS offers cloud based inventory management, allowing you to control your entire inventory effortlessly. Customizable, no-code dashboards give you real-time insights, sales and shipment tracking help you stay on top of your supplies, and automations decrease the risk of supply chain gaps. monday.com Work OS helps teams visualize their projects, and manage work processes the way that fits them best.

related_products.short_desc: Asset tracking platform that is cloud-based with mobile apps (IOS/Android).  Rated Excellent by PC Mag! Get a free guided demo today!
related_products.features: Asset Panda is a powerful Cloud/Mobile App inventory tracking platform. We help people track, manage and support their inventory throughout their life cycle. Our software is configured to the way our clients work, secure and leverages the mobile devices your employees already carry. Get a free guided demo today!

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Inventory Control Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Inventory Control Software is a modern maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: Inventory control software to regulate stock levels, control assets and inventory, and manage consumables in and out of the company.
related_products.features:
Cloud based Inventory Control software enables you to track and manage inventory and assets for a remote team. Track vendors, move inventory across locations, and customize low stock threshold alerts for optimized inventory management. Scan Barcodes and QR Codes with mobile apps/external scanners. Our procurement module allows quick inventory replenishment. Start using most reviewed, highest rated inventory control software today.
Reach out to us for special discounts related to COVID19

related_products.short_desc: This complete software enriches businesses with its intuitive cloud-based interface, advanced sales management and built-in reports.
related_products.features: Lightspeed Retail Point of Sale offers the best in class inventory management and control is an all-in-one cloud-based EPOS. Lightspeed simplifies the way you do inventory both for single and multi-store retailers. Manage your inventory, keep tabs on your sales, manage your employees, process payments and create unforgettable shopping experiences that keep customers coming back again and again all from your iPad.

related_products.short_desc: Proactively manage inventory to reduce handling costs and optimize cash flow with NetSuite inventory management.
related_products.features: NetSuite inventory management provides businesses real-time visibility of all items, inventory and orders as they enter, move throughout and exit the warehouse, providing ultimate visibility and control. NetSuite's supply chain management capabilities manage goods from the supplier, through the production process and ensure their delivery to the final customer. Coupled with NetSuite's demand and supply planning, businesses can be confident they can meet demand, while not holding too much stock.

related_products.short_desc: Proactively manage inventory to reduce handling costs and optimize cash flow with NetSuite inventory management.

NetSuite's supply chain management capabilities manage goods from the supplier, through the production process and ensure their delivery to the final customer. Coupled with NetSuite's demand and supply planning, businesses can be confident they can meet demand, while not holding too much stock.

related_products.short_desc: Fishbowl is the only enterprise-grade inventory management solution that focuses on streamlining your manufacturing process.
related_products.features: When it comes to inventory control, Fishbowl makes you look good. Manage your manufacturing and distribution process with real-time data, without any of the excessive costs that often accompany other solutions. With Fishbowl's complete manufacturing and inventory management solution, you can reduce costs exponentially while maximizing profitability-all while streamlining your business processes.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management, and order management solution with best-in-class built-in EDI and 700 integrations.
related_products.features: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management and order management solution with built-in EDI and integrations to all the popular eCommerce platforms, marketplaces, and 3PLs. It's best-in-class for all combinations of B2B and D2C sales channels, warehouses, shipping, and fulfillment. Cin7 provides exceptional automations, workflows, reports, and analysis to enable brands, retailers, and wholesalers to operate efficiently as they scale and efficiently match demand to supply.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of products.
related_products.features:
QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of your products as you sell and restock across multiple warehouse locations and channels. 

QuickBooks Commerce allows brands to automate and integrate their commerce platforms and get powerful insights into all their sales data on-demand.

Features include live inventory and manufacturing management, batch tracking for end-to-end traceability, a Shop Floor App for total floor-level control, open API, and a growing channel partner network. Real-time master planning features automate resource allocation based on prioritized sales orders and integrations with e-commerce, accounting, CRM, and reporting services to centralize your operations in one visual platform.

similar_products.short_desc: SkuVault solves the most difficult challenge in eCommerce fulfillment: managing and tracking inventory at scale.
similar_products.features:
SkuVault solves the most difficult challenge in eCommerce fulfillment: managing and tracking inventory at scale. Our platform delivers transparency into inventory location, quantity, and velocity, and is the true centerpiece of all integrations. 

SkuVault enables clients to eliminate mis-ships, stockouts, and oversells. Our best in class  sales forecasting, order accuracy, and clear reporting help merchants create a clean and organized warehouse so they can sell more.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based platform that allows businesses to handle purchase orders and track inventory restocking on a centralized platform.
similar_products.features: Cloud-based platform that allows businesses to handle purchase orders and track inventory restocking on a centralized platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Sell more, worry less. Simplify your selling with Square for Retail. Try it free for 30 days.
similar_products.features: Square for Retail is a platform of software, hardware, and payments for retail businesses. Its built for your storefront and back office. Its built for boosting sales and cutting costs. Its built for making the complicated stuff simple. Ring up a sale in seconds by scanning a bar code or searching with a keyword. Attach a customer or card on file to the sale for a seamless and fast checkout. Add inventory from your point of sale and instantly create customer profiles. Try it free for 30 days!

similar_products.short_desc: Paladin's Powerfully Simple and Proven Point of Sale and Inventory Management software helps independent retail businesses run better.
similar_products.features:
Paladin Point of Sale and Inventory Management

For over 40 years, Paladin Data Corp. has been helping independent retail businesses run better. The hybrid retail system automates ordering, tracks inventory and provides detailed reports along with hundreds of integrations to enable the tools you need to succeed in managing your business more efficiently.

Learn more about Paladin's intuitive interface, easy set-up process, low monthly payments (no long-term contracts) and highly rated support.

similar_products.short_desc: Finale Inventory is the most adaptable & flexible inventory management system, built to support the workflows of your growing business.
similar_products.features: Finale Inventory is the most adaptable and flexible inventory management system to support your workflows of your growing business.  Integrates seamlessly to many eCommerce selling platforms to prevent overselling.   Take the guesswork with POs by leveraging Finale to dynamically calculate reorder points based on sale velocity and supplier lead times. Bundle our software with barcode scanning hardware for a comprehensive warehouse management solution.   Complimentary training / consulting.

similar_products.short_desc: The industry's simplest (mobile friendly) Inventory and asset tracking system. Trusted by 1000's of businesses. Get it for free today!
similar_products.features:
Sortly is a super simple inventory and asset tracking system to VISUALLY track your items and their details including location, price, condition etc for a more intuitive (and less maddening) way to track your items. 

Key Features: 
- Access via  Smartphone, Computer (web), Tablet
- Create or connect to any barcodes or QR codes
- Check in/out items with in-built scanner
- Give team members or customer access 

Trusted by 1000's of leading businesses. Get started for free today.

similar_products.short_desc: Sellercloud's patented inventory management technology helps you keep track of what you have and where you have it at all times.
similar_products.features: Sellercloud's dynamic warehouse management system can track inventory regardless of its status ? in transit, non-sellable, etc. Low inventory alerts make it simple and convenient to re-order directly from your supplier without ever leaving the platform. Product availability amounts are automatically updated across all channels to eliminate manual stock updates. Sellercloud automatically reserves availability when an order is first created and decreases it from physical inventory upon shipping.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart inventory planning software for growing business. Save up to 40% in working capital, reduce over/under ordering. 14 day trial.
similar_products.features:
StockTrim is cloud-based demand forecasting and inventory planning software for SMB's (retailers, manufacturers, wholesalers, distributors).
Its based on smart technology including a proprietary machine learning (AI) algorithm that continually learns and re-adjusts demand models in real time
Key Features include:
 Intuitive Order Plan
 Detailed Demand Analysis
 Manufacturing Features
 Variable Lead Times
 Multiple Locations
 Ability to Forecast New Products
 Automated Purchase Order Plans

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Barcoding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Barcoding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Barcoding software provides companies with barcode and inventory solutions. This type of software allows companies to create, index, and print barcodes for various industries such as supply chain management, retail, shipping, and compliance labeling. Barcoding software is related to Inventory Control software, Inventory Management software, Mobile software, Warehouse Management software, and Shipping software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Management software monitors inventory levels for optimal production and distribution of goods for wholesale or retail. These applications enable organizations to efficiently manage inventory as well as procurement and order fulfillment functions. Inventory Management solutions ensure accurate real-time inventory reporting and the ability to distribute this essential data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Inventory Management software is related to Inventory Control software and Supply Chain Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Retail Management systems on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Retail Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Retail Management Systems software manages financial reporting, accounting, and operations of retail stores by integrating core business processes such as point of sale (POS), customer relationship management (CRM), inventory management, accounting, human resources, marketing and eCommerce. By implementing a Retail Management System, organizations can increase sales, decrease costs, and maximize their competitive advantage. These applications facilitate the distribution of key data throughout an enterprise and provide the infrastructure for accurate sales reporting and revenue forecasting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Warehouse Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Warehouse Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Warehouse Management software enables the movement, tracking and storage of materials throughout the warehouse. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Warehouse Management solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as procurement management and channel monitoring features. They also offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting and business reporting tools. Warehouse Management software is related to Distribution software and Logistics software.

_source.short_desc: Inventory, order tracking, invoicing and reporting web app for SMEs across multiple locations - including manufacturing.
_source.long_desc:
Web-based inventory, order tracking, invoicing and reporting system for small & medium sized companies across multiple locations - including production handling.

See stock alerts, supplier availability & lead times. Track stock levels, cost, inventory value. Handle picking, serials, batches and barcodes, returns, consignment, drop shipping, internal transfers.

Adopt Megaventory for successful management of your business and enjoy the user-friendly interface and comprehensive support!
_source.pricing_details:
Pro: $150/month for 5 users, 50k transactions.
Enterprise: Contact Megaventory for detailed pricing information.
_source.target_audience: CEO/COO/IT manager of a business of 10+ people that buy, sell, distribute or manufacture physical goods primarily.

related_products.short_desc: Follow up on every opportunity and win new business by creating professional, customisable, online quotes or estimates on the spot.
related_products.features: Xero helps you win new business by creating beautiful, customised quotes on the spot. Never miss an opportunity by sending quotes to your prospective customers as soon as you've discussed the work they'd like done. Customers can accept, decline or comment on the quote with the click of a button, then you can easily edit and resend if you need to. Once the job is done, simply create an invoice from your quote, which they can easily pay online.

related_products.short_desc: Build, track, and eSign your docs all in one place using legally binding online signatures.
related_products.features: Need to send out accurate proposals that will impress your clients without spending an hour or more on each one? PandaDoc allows you to create new quotes right inside your CRM with a single click, track quote views and signatures once theyre sent, and accept payment via secure credit card transaction fields.

related_products.short_desc: The fastest, easiest, and highest value Quoting Software. Automate everything from customer estimates to getting paid.
related_products.features: mHelpDesk is the easiest and most powerful solution for your business, automating everything from first customer quotes all the way to getting paid. We provide our customers with mobile and online tools that are unmatched in performance, reliability, and functionality. We've packed the best tools into one extremely easy-to-use and affordable package that requires no big upfront investment. And we have in-house product experts to get you up and running immediately.

related_products.short_desc: Jobber is perfect for home service businesses that want to keep jobs on track and provide a seamless customer experience. Try it free!
related_products.features: Jobber keeps your jobs on track and your customers informed. Send quotes and invoices by text and email, schedule jobs more efficiently, and optimize routes. Give your crew the job details they need, see where they are, and get notified when a job is done. Send automatic payment reminders and take payments instantly in-person, online within 24 hours, or automatically every month. With a mobile app, free training, and simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free CRM with built in quotes and invoices. Unlimited quotes and invoices 100% free. 8 million clients worldwide.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free quotation and invoices software, you are in the right place. Bitrix24 is a free CRM with unlimited quotes and invoices. Unlike other free quotation invoice solutions, Bitrix24 quotes and invoices are fully customizable and come with powerful tools, like multiple currency support, taxes, automatic numbering, product catalog and email marketing.

related_products.short_desc: Fully integrated, automated, and easy-to-use interface designed to help users sell faster, communicate quicker, and maximize profits.
related_products.features: Sell faster, communicate more efficiently, and maximize profits with Odoo Sales. Quickly send polished quotations, with an easy-to-use eSignature feature and online payment options. Odoo Sales is fully integrated with other Odoo apps, and automates a number of time-consuming tasks, thus freeing users to focus on customer relationships and revenue.

Boost your team's efficiency with cutting-edge features our customers love, like our Boards tool, automation options, and mobile app.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud based custom manufacturing solution with quoting, business intelligence, employee management, and more.

Perfect for

related_products.short_desc: Invoice2go makes it easy to send invoices & estimates, accept online payments and manage your business. Free 30 day trial.

Easily create and send custom invoices with a few clicks, accept payments online and manage your business at-a-glance with business insights reporting.  

Looking for more tools to run your business? Invoice2go also features appointment scheduling, time tracking, expense tracking and more.  

Try our newest profiles and review features to increase visibility online and earn customer trust.

related_products.short_desc: Scoro is an end-to-end work management solution that enables you to control your entire workflow in one place.
related_products.features:
Scoro is an award-winning end-to-end work management solution that enables you to control your entire workflow in one place.

In addition to project management features, Scoro provides all the tools you need to fully manage your business: work & task scheduling and tracking, collaboration, contact database & CRM, quoting and billing, advanced reporting, real-time dashboards, and much more. Sign up for a 14-day free trial to see for yourself!

related_products.short_desc: Automate quoting, accept payments, and increase your conversion rate with Better Proposals.
related_products.features: Better Proposals is an all-in-one digital document solution for businesses that want to streamline their sales processes. With its intuitive and easy-to-use editor, it lets you create and send your quotes in just a few minutes. Say goodbye to manual entry thanks to its CRM integrations and accept payments through Stripe, GoCardless, and PayPal.

Native integration with your CRM (Microsoft Dynamics, Salesforce and Freshworks).

Send automatic payment reminders and take payments instantly in-person, online within 24 hours, or automatically every month. With a mobile app, free training, and simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service.

similar_products.short_desc: Ignition makes it simple to engage clients, get paid and run your business on autopilot. From impressive online proposals to automated
similar_products.features:

With Ignition, you can easily win new business with impressive digital proposals, engage new and existing clients with a clear scope of work, and get paid on time by automating payment collection - all in one.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top CPQ software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of CPQ tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Configure Price Quote (CPQ) software helps large companies quickly provide accurate quotes based on fluctuating pricing and cost variables. CPQ software lets you provide customers with upselling and bundling options, achieve more accurate quotes based on global economic factors and inventory, and align your sales with a rapidly changing market. CPQ software is closely related to Sales Force Automation software, Product Configurator software, Job Costing software, Quoting software, and Proposal Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Job Costing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Job Costing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Job Costing software is designed to help businesses forecast and maintain records of project costs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Configurator software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Configurator tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Configurator software automates the configuration of build-to-order products with multiple options. These applications, also known as Sales Configurator solutions, provide manufacturing operations with the capability to easily and efficiently produce highly customizable and configurable product lines. Product Configurator software instantly translates customers' product requests into real-time generated quotes, descriptions, images, bills of material and invoices. Typically Product Configurator applications are integrated with an eCommerce solution, allowing customers to create customized orders in real-time at the time of purchase. Product Configurator software is related to Manufacturing Execution Systems and MRP software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.
